title: Alcatel 3T 10 3 GB RAM 32 GB ROM 10 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Prime Black)

product_specification.Additional Features: Face Unlock, FM Radio, Dual Speakers, Far Field AI Voice Control, Wi-Fi Display
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Power Adapter, USB Cable, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Wi-Fi Direct, OTG and Bluetooth Support
product_specification.Other Display Features: HD LED Backlit Multi Touch IPS Display
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Google Voice Assistant: With Google Assistant built-in, you can command this device to play an album or create a to-do list. You can also pair this tablet with your smart home devices to control interfaces such as TVs, lights, and more. Thanks to the far-field DSP, this device enables seamless voice recognition up to 3 m so you can continue to knead the dough while asking this device to read out the latest news.
product_description.Clear Audio Quality: If entertainment uplifts your mood even on gloomy days, then this tablet will be your ideal companion. The powerful audio output from the dual inbuilt speakers delivers a studio-like effect, so you can stay entertained at all times.
product_description.Android 9 Pie OS: Thanks to the Android 9 Pie OS, you can enjoy a true AI experience on this tablet. This OS offers interesting features, such as Adaptive Battery and Adaptive Brightness which give a new dimension to browsing the Internet or playing games.
product_description.Powerful Performance: This tablet comes with 3 GB of RAM and offers an internal storage of 32 GB so you can store a large number of files, videos, and music albums. The long-lasting 5500 mAh battery will ensure that you can go an entire day, watching movies, playing games, or browsing websites, without having to keep this device plugged in.
product_description.Face Key Recognition: Just a look is all it takes to unlock this amazing tablet. The Face Key makes use of a 30° detection radius and 106 key points to quickly unlock this device.

review:
A decent tablet from Alcatel . you can't expect anything extraordinary in this price range.
Pros:
1) A huge HD display. You can actually enjoy watching movies, YouTube, Netflix. It's a 720p display, so maintain a distance from screen.
2) Great for reading books.
3) It supports 4G Volte.
4) Sound is loud enough ( Quality is not upto the mark )

Cons:
1) User interface is not that smooth. Never expected this much lagging.
2) You can't run any large application, even small games won't run smoothly.
3) Camera experience is pathetic.

*** If you have a tight budget ,can't spend more than Rs. 6500 - 7000 , and watching videos and reading books is your primary priority, then trust me this is the best tablet for you.
**** Disable some pre-installed apps which you think you won't use. It will add some speed in your Tab.

Hit like if my review was helpful to you. Thanks for reading. Have a good day.

Nice tablet under 6999/-
only problem is it's camera which is VGA type . It has WINDOWS 10 like feature which is good because it looks like laptop feeling. only HD video supported
Touch is very smooth. Battery backup is also nice up to 6hrs for videos.....

Good tab at this price point
if u ar using it for reading pdf books its a good option at budget range

Camera is absolute garbage

Screen quality is not good especially if you're planning to buy this for watching movie eventhough its a hd screen
1080p videos are playable but don't expect the quality like from our mobile (same with YouTube also only upto 720 p are only playable)

Battery backup is really astonishing even though its a 4080mah it give me a screen on time time of around 5- 5:30 hours which is pretty good Thanks to the under powered Quad-Core processor(no fast charging facility they are bundling with 5V 2A charger)

Games are playable under low graphics setting without any lag(Don't even think of playing PUBG and other high end games) Currently i installed beach buggy racing and temple run which works fine

Overall bulit quality of the product is acceptable
The gud thing is they are bundling it with head phone & screen guard

Two front firing Speakers are really loud but clarity decrease as we increase volume but gud

Overall I am satisfied only thing disappointing is the screen quality

1. Display: 3.5/5 FHD would have been better but readings and videos are good
2. Sound: 3/5 I have purchased the model without soundbox but it's fine for listening to songs and watching videos.
3. Speed; 4/5 The laptop doesnt hang even after loading so many apps and is pleasant to use.
4. Battery backup 4/5 Lasts a day with moderate use.
5. Touch : 3.5/5 Touch is good but could have been better ( Using phones feel more smooth to touch then this tablet)
6. Value for money : 5/5 I got it at 6999 with 10% discount which is a decent deal.
7. Seller packing: 1/5 I have never seen an expensive product packaged so poorly ever. Even utensils come properly packed than this tablet came
8 Design: 5/5 The tablet looks very beautiful and is amazingly light weight.
9. Camera 1/5 Horrible at this era of cameras.
10. Flipkart exchange policy : 1/5 They just refuse to take old smartphones giving nonsense reasons so never try to exchange in Flipkart.
Edit: After 1 week of use :
This tablet software is not very user-friendly. I am mentioning the issues faced
1. You cant see the data transfer speed in notification like other mobile phones(No option to activate)
2. Rotation lock doesn't work if your tablet goes to landscape mode. It will override rotation lock and rotate.
3. Flipkart which has been provided by the tablet keeps crashing the moment you search any product in it.
4. No notification light is there (a hardware missing feature)

Please let me know if you find a solution to these problems.

I've ordered this tab on 29 September & received on 4th October.when I received,the display of the tab was broken then I make a return request.After the day I've called the customer care & they respond very well & the seller approved my return request. Thereafter I reorder the tab & get fully good package .the performance of the tab is very great at this price range.overall good product. Thank u flipkart & indiflashsmart seller.

Tablet is slow extremely slow ...if you uninstall netplex and other useless software than tablet give you proper response other wise it's crash YouTube several time ...video quality is good Respect to 7000 sound is also good don't expect too much...good deal for reading and YouTube..not at all for game for watching movie and YouTube is better deal

Bought this in a good deal during sale. Both front and back Camera is like VGA with no clarity to read small printed words. When downloading camera app, it shows max of 2MP when the product says 5MP. Except this the battery, performance is good so far. It solves the purpose of learning for my kid

Pros
1) Screen size. it is comfortable for reading docs, PDF and compose mails
2) light weight - it is comfortable to carry
3) Battery backup is ok - one day - moderate use
4) Calls I/O is good
5) No heat issue till now.

Cons
1) Some apps closes frequently and automatically with an error message. (including pre-installed Flipkart app). Processing speed is not great but ok for light use
2) camera cannot be used for taking good photos
3) face unlock needs to be improved.
4) display is not good. (but ok for this budget)
5) sim slot cover - should be handled carefully else we will miss.
6) Sound needs improvements and it is very low
7) Cannot uninstall pre-installed apps

Note:
The review has been posted for 3days of use.

First Impression: The tab is working smoothly and lag free. There are no noticeable problems or heating. The OS is android 9 pie and is running smoothly. The display is just average, but usable. The most recommended usage is to read ebooks. It's a very good tablet if you use it to read pdf or epub books.

Pros:
1. Affordable pricing
2. Comparatively good display in this price range - Average experience to watch movies and Good experience to read books
3. Free screen guard in the package.
4. Slim, lightweight and sufficient grip which makes the tablet ergonomic.
5. Latest Android 9 pie OS which is almost stock and very fluidic in usability.

Cons:
1. Audio output is below average quality only. Speakers are giving very bad sound. Better to purchase the variant with attached external speaker, if you care about sound a lot.
2. Camera is just a joke. Never expect an ipad camera or even a entry level smartphone camera. The camera in this tablet reminded me of old VGA camera in feature phones.
3. Not good for heavy games or apps
4. The internal storage is limited. 16gb is not good for the price.

good tablet go for it.
I purchased for watching videos and reading,have some good inbuilt features.
2gb ram is good enough.you get 10gb of free space,
battery is good,I have used 3hrs 30 min with drainage of 39%.you can disable some useless apps.
CHARGING- 5v 2A charger speed enough charging 54% to 100% in about 1hrs.
camera- bad(I didn't have to use that)
DISPLAY-very good but slightly reflective.
sound quality is good.
screen protector provided with pack is of very bad quality.
suggestion:-
1)use nova launcher for friendly interface.
2)use laptop screen gaurd and resize it(get it done by professional)

This is a good device in this price range. Performance is not up to mark but fine as 2 gb ram is not sufficient for heavy games and tasks. Some time app crashes may be because of less ram. Battery back up is good as per it's capacity. Overall good product so far.
Great Product at this prize range. Best suitable for watching movies and YouTube. Great Battery backup. Bit laggy but does the function. Satisfied by the purchase.
Clear Cut on the price point its a winner. Runs smooth on one hand and on other, it has great viewing experience. Dual front firing speakers makes audio effects really good.

The device is good considering the price at which I got it during big billion day offer. So far I'm really satisfied..camera is not good. Performance wise it's ok.. you cannot play hardcore games.. space is quite low but can be expanded. Overall it's a nice buy..

Bought it for Rs.6999 during BB Sale. Best for basic educational purpose. Not for gamers. Basic camera, good sound and good display at this price range. Worth every penny.

Worth its value, at this amount no other tablet can beat this or even at a price point of 10k, no one can come closer. good money value ,economical easy to use.camera needs to be upgraded rest all is good. good for studies like using byjus app etc for children

I would say for the price it is doing its job perfectly. Don't compare this tab with any other costlier models. This is working flawless. Am using it for business purpose. Battery is decent and standy is coming for 5 days. Average Screen on time will be 6 hours. I disabled most of the unwanted apps.

Cons:
Camera
2GB RAM

For a 2GB RAM, the Tablet feels sluggish. The screen responds frame by frame but no complaints while playing the video.
Software comes with preloaded third party apps which can not be uninstalled.
Speaker loudness is low and not very clear. Sound breaks in most cases. Use of additional accessories recommended.
Audio output via headphones jack is also mediocre with low output.
With VoLTE, voice call works fine.
Decent battery life for 4000mAh.
Considering price performance could have been better.

This seems to be the best option for the budget tablet buyer who just wants a tablet for reading pdfs/youtube/browsing/light MSoffice work. This is the only 10 inch tab I could find in this price range (~6000rs at sale) although if you're buying it at 9-10k I wouldnt say it offers that much value for money.

-on starting up you might notice that screen is not as crisp as the ones on your phones, but its not that bad either
-Perfect for PDFs, even heavy pdfs ~300mb with lots of pictures and diagrams work without stutter ( I used Xodo pdf reader, some other pdf readers maybe laggy)
-Great for casual youtube/movie watching, the 2 front facing speakers are great and loud and the sound doesnt get distorted at max volume
-Not built for heavy multitasking as too many background apps may cause it to stutter, though this tab can handle chrome with ~4 tabs, whatsapp,youtube and pdf reader in the background but some pages/apps in the background may reload when you switch to them
-Basic microUSB cable/charger/earphones are included. The screen protector included is a plain plastic one not tempered glass

I will tell you the problem with this tab. Do read before you buy:
1. The display is very poor. No clarity with videos. You can clearly see the glitches while navigation and opening of apps.
2. The major problem is with the software of the device. Every time you switch off the device for more than 10 minutes, Netflix app was deleted.
The more concerning thing with this was that the service center do not have the correct software as the Alcatel does not have it with themselves.
Value for money.
